def_cn: 沙文主义的;本国至上主义的
def_en: If you describe someone as chauvinistic, you believe that they think their own country is more important and morally better than any other.

def_cn: 大男子主义的;男人至上的
def_en: If you describe a man or his behaviour as chauvinistic, you disapprove of him for believing that men are naturally better and more important than women.
